column4: Does anybody know if there's a way to make the touchpad on a notebook multitouch like the new Macbooks?
that might be a hardware and softwareissue, but mainly it has to do with the bios
I would think it would have to do with the way Ubuntu interprets inputs from the touchpad
If the bios is emulateing the touchpad as a ps/2 mouse, then no way, but I don't think there are drivers that support that
